DescriptionTemplate.Name: MissingTagWithValue
DescriptionTemplate.Format: Missing tag '{0}' with expected value '{1}' for {2} '{3}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Format: No '{0}' Action triggered before Command '{1}'. '{0}' Param '{2}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Format: No '{0}' Action triggered before Response '{1}'. '{0}' Param '{2}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Format: Untrimmed option '{0}' in attribute '{1}'. Current value '{2}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Format: Invalid value '{1}' in tag '{0}'. Possible values '{2}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Format: Invalid value '{1}' in tag '{0}'. Possible values '{2}'. {3} {4} '{5}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Format: Invalid value '{0}' in tag '{1}' for {2}. Possible values '{3}'. {4} {5} '{6}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Format: Invalid value '{1}' in attribute '{0}'. Possible values '{2}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Name: InvalidAttributeValueWithPossibleValuesInItem
DescriptionTemplate.Format: Invalid value '{1}' in attribute '{0}'. Possible values '{2}'. {3} {4} '{5}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Name: InvalidCharsInTag
DescriptionTemplate.Format: Invalid chars '{2}' in tag '{0}'. Current value '{1}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Name: InvalidCharsInAttribute
DescriptionTemplate.Format: Invalid chars '{2}' in attribute '{0}'. Current value '{1}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Name: InvalidOptionInAttribute
DescriptionTemplate.Format: Invalid option '{0}' in attribute '{1}'. {2} {3} '{4}'. Current Value '{5}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Name: InvalidValueOnItemReferencedBy
DescriptionTemplate.Format: Invalid {0} '{1}' on {4} referenced by {2}. Expected value '{3}'. {4} {5} '{6}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Name: MultipleItemsWithSameId
DescriptionTemplate.Format: More than one {0} with same ID '{1}'. {0} Names '{2}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Name: MultipleItemsWithSameIdInItem
DescriptionTemplate.Format: More than one {0} with same ID '{1}' in {3} '{4}'. {0} Names '{2}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Name: NonExistingRefInOptionInItem
DescriptionTemplate.Format: '{0}' option refers to a non-existing column {1} '{2}' in table '{3}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Name: NonExistingRefInCSharpMethod
DescriptionTemplate.Format: Method '{0}' references a non-existing '{1}' with {2} '{3}'. QAction ID '{4}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Name: NonExistingRefInAttributeOptionInItem
DescriptionTemplate.Format: Option '{0}' in attribute '{1}' references a non-existing '{2}' with {3} '{4}'. {5} {6} '{7}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Name: UnsupportedAttributeInItemDueTo
DescriptionTemplate.Format: Unsupported attribute '{0}' in combination with '{1}' '{2}' and '{3}' '{4}'. {5} {6} '{7}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Name: UnsupportedTagForParamDisplayType
DescriptionTemplate.Format: Unsupported '{0}' tag for '{1}' Param with ID '{2}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Name: UnsupportedActionOnItemManagedByItem
DescriptionTemplate.Format: Unsupported {0} on {1} '{2}' managed by {3} '{4}' with '{5}' containing '{6}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Name: CSharpMethodArgumentInvalidType
DescriptionTemplate.Format: Invocation of method '{0}' has an invalid type '{1}' for the argument '{2}'. QAction ID '{3}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Name: CSharpObloletePreprocessorDirective
DescriptionTemplate.Format: Obsolete preprocessor directive '{0}' used in QAction. QAction ID '{1}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Name: CSharpImplementsUnsupportedInterface
DescriptionTemplate.Format: Entry point class {0} implements unsupported interface {1}. QAction ID '{2}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Name: CSharpUnrecommendedUseOfMagicNumber
DescriptionTemplate.Format: Unrecommended use of magic number '{0}', use '{1}' {2} instead. QAction ID '{3}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Name: CSharpMethodIncompatible
DescriptionTemplate.Format: Invocation of method '{0}.{1}' is not compatible with '{2}'. QAction ID '{3}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Name: CSharpMethodUnexpectedImplementation
DescriptionTemplate.Format: Method '{0}' with arguments '{1}' is not implemented as expected. QAction ID '{2}'.

DescriptionTemplate.Name: CSharpUnrecommendedPropertySet
DescriptionTemplate.Format: Setting property '{0}.{1}' is unrecommended. QAction ID '{2}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: MissingTag
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Add Protocol root tag to the document.

ErrorMessage.Name: MissingTag
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Add <Name></Name> to the protocol.

ErrorMessage.Name: UntrimmedTag
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Remove the leading/trailing whitespaces.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidChars
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Remove or replace the invalid characters.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidPrefix

Description.Format: Invalid prefix '{1}' in 'Protocol/Name' tag. Current value '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Remove invalid prefix and trim if needed.

Description.Format: Protocol Name '{0}' changed into '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: MissingTag
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Add <Provider></Provider> to the protocol.

ErrorMessage.Name: MissingTag
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Add <SNMP></SNMP> to the protocol.

Description.Format: DVE Protocol with Name '{0}' for Table '{1}' was changed into '{2}'.
DVE Protocol with Name '{0}' for Table '{1}' was removed.
NoElementPrefix option was added to DVE Protocol with Name '{0}' for Table '{1}'.
NoElementPrefix option was removed from DVE Protocol with Name '{0}' for Table '{1}'.
Unicode option on protocol was added.
Unicode option on protocol was removed.
Invalid DVE Param Type '{0}'. Expected Type 'array'. Param ID '{1}'.
RTDisplay(true) expected on DVE Table. Table PID '{0}'.
DVE Protocol with Name '{0}' for Table '{1}' was changed into '{2}'.
DVE Protocol with Name '{0}' for Table '{1}' was removed.
Unknown connection type '{0}' in Connection '{1}'.
ElementPrefix was added to DVE Protocol with Name '{0}' for Table '{1}'.
ElementPrefix was removed from DVE Protocol with Name '{0}' for Table '{1}'.
Partitioned trending was enabled on protocol.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidDeclaration

Description.Format: Invalid XML encoding '{0}'. Possible values '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Remove the XML declaration if not set to UTF-8.

ErrorMessage.Name: MissingAttribute
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Specify a default page using the defaultPage attribute.

ErrorMessage.Name: EmptyAttribute
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Specify a default page in the defaultPage attribute.

Description.Format: The specified defaultPage '{0}' does not exist.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidDefaultPage

Description.Format: The default page should be a page with name 'General'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Define a page with name 'General' and specify it as the default page.

Description.Format: Unsupported popup page '{0}' in defaultPage attribute.
Unsupported popup page '{0}' in 'Protocol/Display@pageOrder' attribute.
Missing page '{0}' on 'Protocol/Display@pageOrder' attribute.

ErrorMessage.Name: MissingWebPage

Description.Format: Missing WebInterface page.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Make sure the webInterface page(s) are defined as last and preceded by a separator page.

ErrorMessage.Name: WrongWebPagePosition

Description.Format: Web page '{0}' should be defined after all regular pages and the first web page should be preceded by a separator.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Make sure the webInterface page(s) are defined as last and preceded by a separator page.

Description.Format: The specified page '{0}' does not exist.
Page '{0}' has been added more than once to the pageOrder attribute.
Param with ID '{0}' is positioned on page '{1}' which is not ordered via 'Protocol/Display@pageOrder' attribute.
RTDisplay(true) expected on Param '{0}' referenced by the 'Protocol/Display@pageOrder' attribute.
Connection {0} has mismatching names: {1}.
Invalid connection name '{0}' for a '{1}' connection. Connection ID '{2}'.
Connection count in 'Protocol/Type' tag '{0}' does not match with PortSettings count '{1}'.
Connections can not be defined simultaneously via 'Protocol/Type' and 'Protocol/Connections'.
Unrecommended use of the 'Protocol/Connections' syntax.
Order of connections changed from '{0}' to '{1}'.
{0} Connection '{1}' with name '{2}' was changed into '{3}'.
{0} Connection '{1}' with name '{2}' was added.
Endless loop detected. Involved items '{0}'
Potential endless loop detected. Involved items '{0}'
Minimum required version '{0}' too low. Expected value '{1}'.
Feature used in '{0}' with '{1}' '{2}'.
Feature used in '{0}'.
Minimum DataMiner required version increased from '{0}' to '{1}'.
Protocol minimum required DM version '{0}' is lower than the Skyline minimum supported DM version '{1}'.
Ping group for '{0}' connection is not a '{0}' poll group. Group ID '{1}'.
Ping pair for '{0}' connection contains no response. Pair ID '{1}'.
Multiple ping pairs for connection with name '{0}' and type '{1}'. Connection ID '{2}'.
Multiple ping pairs for connection '{0}'. Pair '{1}'.
RTDisplay(true) expected on Param '{0}' used as page visibility condition. Page name '{1}'.
The page '{0}' specified in 'Protocol/Display@wideColumnPages' does not exist.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidAttribute
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Make sure that the Protocol@baseFor attribute value is not equal to the value specified in Protocol/ElementType.

Description.Format: Invalid use of Spectrum ID range for Param with ID '{0}'.
Invalid use of Mediation ID range for Param with ID '{0}'.
Invalid use of DataMiner Modules ID range for Param with ID '{0}'.
Invalid use of Enhanced Service ID range for Param with ID '{0}'.
Invalid use of SLA ID range for Param with ID '{0}'.
Missing displayed Param. Param Name '{0}'. Param Type '{1}'. Param ID '{2}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: RTDisplayExpectedOnSpectrumParam

Description.Format: RTDisplay(true) expected on Spectrum Params. Param ID '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Either the parameter should be removed, either its RTDisplay tag should be set to true.

ErrorMessage.Name: UntrimmedTag
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Remove the leading/trailing whitespaces.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidChars
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Remove or replace invalid chars.

Description.Format: Invalid Param Name '{1}'. Param ID '{0}'. The Param Name is reserved by DataMiner for internal use.

ErrorMessage.Name: UnrecommendedChars
ErrorMessage.GroupDescription: Unrecommended chars in some parameter names.

Description.Format: Unrecommended chars '{2}' in tag '{0}'. Current value '{1}'.

AutoFixWarnings.AutoFixWarning: Double check the use of the Parameter class in QActions.
Double check the use of the (Get/Set)ParameterByName methods in QActions.

Description.Format: Unrecommended start chars '{2}' in tag '{0}'. Current value '{1}'.
Logger table column name '{0}' for column PID '{1}' on table '{2}' was changed into '{3}'.
RTDisplay(true) expected on Param '{0}' used as context menu for table.
RTDisplay(true) expected on Param '{0}' used for QAction feedback.

ErrorMessage.Name: MissingDefaultThreshold
ErrorMessage.GroupDescription: Missing default thresholds on some monitored parameters.

Description.Format: Missing default thresholds on monitored parameter. Param ID '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: RTDisplayExpected

Description.Format: RTDisplay(true) expected on Param '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Double check the subresults to evaluate if the features requiring RTDisplay are to be removed or if RTDisplay actually has to be set to true.

ErrorMessage.Name: RTDisplayUnexpected

Description.Format: Unexpected RTDisplay(true) on Param '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Double check if this Param requires RTDisplay for reasons that are outside the scope of this driver (Visios, automation scripts, etc).[NewLine]- If so, suppress this result and explain why RTDisplay is required via the suppression comment.[NewLine]- If not, remove the full Display tag containing this RTDisplay tag.

Description.Format: Trending on Param '{0}' was disabled.

ErrorMessage.Name: RTDisplayExpected

Description.Format: RTDisplay(true) expected on trended parameters. Param ID '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Double check if trending is really needed:[NewLine]- if not, remove trending.[NewLine]- If so, set RTDisplay tag to true.

ErrorMessage.Name: EmptyTag
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Either add a correct unit, either remove the Unit tag.

Description.Format: Obsolete unit '{0}'. New syntax '{1}'. Param ID '{2}'.
Unknown unit '{0}'. Param ID '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: UnsupportedTag
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Remove the Units tag.

ErrorMessage.Name: ExcessiveTag

Description.Format: Excessive tag '{0}' because of {1}. Param ID '{2}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Remove the unit.

ErrorMessage.Name: UntrimmedTag
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Remove leading and/or trailing whitespaces.

ErrorMessage.Name: MissingAttribute

Description.Format: Missing (page)button width attribute. Param '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Add Measurement.Type@width attribute with a value equal or greater than 110.

ErrorMessage.Name: EmptyWidth

Description.Format: Empty (page)button width attribute. Param '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Fill in Measurement.Type@width attribute with a value equal or greater than 110.

ErrorMessage.Name: UntrimmedWidth

Description.Format: Untrimmed (page)button width attribute '{0}'. Param '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Remove leading and/or trailing whitespaces

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidWidth

Description.Format: Invalid (page)button width attribute '{0}'. Param '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Fill in Measurement.Type@width attribute with a value equal or greater than 110.

ErrorMessage.Name: InconsistentWidth

Description.Format: Inconsistent (page)buttons width on page '{0}'. PIDs '{1}' - Widths '{2}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Adjust the width of this button to the highest width value of all buttons on this page.

ErrorMessage.Name: UnsupportedAttribute

Description.Format: The width attribute is not supported for '{0}'. Param '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Remove the Measurement.Type@width attribute.

Description.Format: Unrecommended (page)button width '{0}'. Param '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: EmptyTag
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Either add 'Range/Low' and/or 'Range/High' tag(s), either remove the empty 'Display/Range' tag.

Description.Format: Range/Low '{0}' should be smaller than Range/High '{1}'. Param ID '{2}'.
Discreet value tag with display '{0}' on Param '{1}' was changed from '{2}' into '{3}'.
Discreet tag with value '{0}' on Param '{1}' was removed.
Discreet display tag with value '{0}' on Param '{1}' was changed from '{2}' into '{3}'.
Invalid pagebutton caption format '{0}'. Suggested fix '{1}'. Param ID '{2}'.
Description tag on Param '{0}' was changed from '{1}' into '{2}'.
Description tag with value '{0}' on Param '{1}' was removed.
DisplayColumn attribute with column idx '{0}' on table '{1}' was changed into naming options: '{2}'.
DisplayColumn attribute with column idx '{0}' on table '{1}' was changed into NamingFormat: '{2}'.
DisplayColumn attribute with column idx '{0}' on table '{1}' was removed.
DisplayColumn attribute with column idx '{0}' on table '{1}' was added.
DisplayColumn attribute with column idx '{0}' on table '{1}' was changed to idx '{2}'.
Database link for logger table '{0}' was removed.

ErrorMessage.Name: PreserveStateShouldBeAvoided

Description.Format: Unrecommended use of the "preserve state" option on table '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Use a QAction to compare the previous and new values of the cells, and calculate the state of each row.

ErrorMessage.Name: ViewTableInvalidReference

Description.Format: Table view option '{0}' must refer to an existing table excluding the view table itself. View table PID '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Make sure the view table refers to an existing table, excluding view tables.

Description.Format: Column '{0}' specified in the filterChange option must refer to a column of the view table '{1}'.
Column '{0}' specified in the directView option of view table '{1}' must refer to a column of another table.
Interprete type on Param '{0}' has been changed from '{1}' to '{2}'.
Interprete type on Param '{0}' has been removed.
New Type tag '{0}' for interprete in Param '{1}' was added.
Matrix Dimensions on Param '{0}' was changed from '{1}' to '{2}'.
Matrix Dimensions '{0}' on Param '{1}' were removed.
HeaderTrailerLink option should be defined on {0} with PID '{1}'.
HeaderTrailerLink option is wrongly defined on {0} with PID '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: ExcessiveHeaderTrailerLinkOptions

Description.Format: HeaderTrailerLink option should not be defined on Param '{0}' as it is nor a header nor a trailer.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Remove the option.

Description.Format: HeaderTrailerLink with ID '{0}' defined on more than 1 {1}. PIDs {2}.
Matrix option '{0}' not inline with option '{1}'. Matrix PID '{2}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidColumnTypeParamRawType

Description.Format: Invalid Interprete/RawType '{0}' for 'Matrix ColumnType Param'. ColumnType PID '{1}'. Matrix PID '{2}'. Possible values 'numeric text, unsigned number'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Either by changing the reference to the columntype parameter withing the matrix parameter.[NewLine]Either by changing the RawType of the parameter currently referenced as bying the columntype parameter.

ErrorMessage.Name: MissingMatrixOptions

Description.Format: Missing '{0}' option for matrix. Param ID '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Make sure both dimensions and columntypes options are correctly defined via the Param/Type@options attribute.

Description.Format: Invalid Param Type '{0}' on matrix. Matrix PID '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidMatrixOption

Description.Format: Invalid syntax for the '{0}' option. Matrix PID '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Make sure both dimensions and columntypes options are correctly defined.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidColumnTypeParamLengthType

Description.Format: Invalid Interprete/LengthType '{0}' for 'Matrix ColumnType Param'. ColumnType PID '{1}'. Matrix PID '{2}'. Possible values 'next param, fixed'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Either by changing the reference to the columntype parameter withing the matrix parameter.[NewLine]Either by changing the LengthType of the parameter currently referenced as bying the columntype parameter.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidColumnTypeParamType

Description.Format: Invalid Interprete/Type '{0}' for 'Matrix ColumnType Param'. ColumnType PID '{1}'. Matrix PID '{2}'. Possible values 'double'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Either by changing the reference to the columntype parameter withing the matrix parameter.[NewLine]Either by changing the Inteprete/Type of the parameter currently referenced as bying the columntype parameter.

Description.Format: Missing 'columntypes' Param with ID '{0}' for matrix Param with ID '{1}'.
Missing 'Interprete' Tag on matrix ColumnType Param with ID '{0}' for matrix Param with ID '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidColumnTypeParamInterprete

Description.Format: Invalid Interprete for 'Matrix ColumnType Param'. ColumnType PID '{0}'. Matrix PID '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Either by changing the reference to the columntype parameter withing the matrix parameter.[NewLine]Either by changing the Inteprete of the parameter currently referenced as bying the columntype parameter.

ErrorMessage.Name: UnrecommendedSshOptions

Description.Format: Unrecommended option '{0}' in Param '{1}'

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Remove the option from the parameter.[NewLine]Reference the parameter in the PortSettings.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidMixOfSshOptionsAndPortSettings

Description.Format: Mixing option {0} and PortSettings SSH is invalid. Param ID '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Remove the option from the parameter.[NewLine]Reference the parameter in the PortSettings.

ErrorMessage.Name: HeaderTrailerLinkShouldHaveConnection

Description.Format: Connection option should be defined on {0} with PID '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Add a connection

ErrorMessage.Name: HeaderTrailerConnectionShouldBeValid

Description.Format: The connection '{0}' needs to be a valid connection type when used on a {1} with PID '{2}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Assign the connection to an ID of a valid connection type

Description.Format: Param '{0}' was removed from page '{1}'.
Normalization with Alarm type '{0}' on Param '{1}' was removed.
Normalization with Alarm type '{0}' on Param '{1}' was changed into '{2}'.
Normalization with Alarm type '{0}' on Param '{1}' was added.
Alarming for Param '{0}' was removed.

ErrorMessage.Name: RTDisplayExpected

Description.Format: RTDisplay(true) expected on alarmed (monitored) parameters. Param ID '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Double check if alarming is really needed:[NewLine]- if not, remove the full Alarm tag.[NewLine]- If so, set RTDisplay tag to true.

Description.Format: Column with PID '{0}' had its SLProtocol position changed from '{1}' into '{2}'. Table PID '{3}'.
Some columns have their SLProtocol position changed. Table PID '{0}'.
Partial Table option was enabled on table '{0}'.

Database type '{0}' for columns on table '{1}' was changed into '{2}'.
HistorySet attribute was enabled on Param '{0}'.
Trend Type '{0}' on Param '{1}' was changed into '{2}'.
Displayed column order with PID's '{0}' in table '{1}' was changed to '{2}'.
Missing column sorting priorities on table '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidConnectedMatrixPoints

Description.Format: '{0}': Invalid '{1}' number of connections for one {2} for matrix '{3}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Make sure the total number of possible connections for a single input or output is not negative nor exceeds the total dimensions of the matrix.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidColumnDimensionsToOutputCount

Description.Format: Matrix Param '{0}' Measurement/Type@options - matrix:outputCount of '{1}' does not match Param/Type@options - dimensions: columnCount of '{2}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Adjust Measurement to match dimensions or vice versa.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidMatrixDimensionsToInputCount

Description.Format: Matrix Param '{0}' Measurement/Type@options - matrix:inputCount of '{1}' does not match Param/Type@options - dimensions: rowCount of '{2}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Adjust Measurement to match dimensions or vice versa.

Description.Format: Invalid syntax for the '{0}' option. Matrix PID '{1}'.
Missing '{0}' option for matrix Param. Matrix PID '{1}'.
Table not mainly sorted on one of its date(time) column(s). Table PID '{0}'. Date(time) column PIDs '{1}'.
RTDisplay(true) expected on Param '{0}' displayed as table column. Table PID '{1}'.
Low range '{0}' in Param '{1}' increased to '{2}'.
Low range '{0}' in Param '{1}' was added.
Range/Low '{0}' should be bigger than zero due to Trending@logarithmic 'true'. Param ID '{1}'.
Range/Low on write Param '{0}' is different than the one on read Param '{1}'. Write PID '{2}'.

High range '{0}' in Param '{1}' was added.

Exception with id '{0}' was removed from Param '{1}'.
Exception with id '{0}' was added to Param '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: ExceptionIncompatibleWithParamType

Description.Format: Interprete/Exceptions is incompatible with Param/Type '{0}'. Param ID '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Use Measurement.Discreets.Discreet tags.

ErrorMessage.Name: TogglebuttonRecommended

Description.Format: Measurement/Type 'togglebutton' is recommended for Param with ID '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Change measurement type to 'togglebutton'.

Description.Format: Invalid RawType '{0}' for matrix Param '{1}'. Expected RawType 'other'.
Invalid Interprete/Type '{0}' for matrix Param '{1}'. Expected Type '{2}'.
Invalid LengthType '{0}' for matrix Param '{1}'. Expected LengthType 'next param'.

ErrorMessage.Name: MatrixAlarmingDisabled
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Enable alarming.

ErrorMessage.Name: MatrixTrendingEnabled
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Disable trending.

ErrorMessage.Name: MatrixSetterOnWrite
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Remove the setter attribute.

Description.Format: Invalid Interprete for matrix Param '{0}'.
Invalid syntax on view option of column with IDX '{0}'. View table '{1}'.
Column view option '{0}' must refer to an existing column of another table. View table PID '{1}'.

Missing Relation between table '{0}' and table '{1}' due to foreignKey on column '{2}'.

RTDisplay(true) expected on PK column Param '{0}' due to '{1}' in 'ColumnOption@options' attribute. Table PID '{2}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: DuplicateDisplayKeyDefinition

Description.Format: Table with ID '{0}' has multiple display key definitions.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Only keep the most recent syntax of defining the display key.

ErrorMessage.Name: DisplayColumnSameAsPK

Description.Format: DisplayColumn is the same as the primary key. Table PID '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Remove the displayColumn='' attribute.

ErrorMessage.Name: DisplayColumnUnrecommended

Description.Format: Unrecommended use of displayColumn. Table PID '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Replace the displayColumn attribute by the NamingFormat tag.

Description.Format: Table display key was changed from {0} '{1}' to {2} '{3}'. Table PID '{4}'.
Table display key previously defined via '{0}' was removed. Table PID '{1}'.
Missing column with ColumnOption@type="displaykey". Table PID {0}.
Unexpected [IDX] suffix on Param/Description. Column Pid {0}.
Table has multiple ColumnOption tags with value 'displaykey' in type attribute. Table Pid {0}.
Unrecommended use of Exception Display '{0}' on Param '{1}'. Possible values '{2}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidDiscreetCount

Description.Format: Invalid number of Discreets '{0}' for matrix Param. Expected count '{1}'. Param ID '{2}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Make sure the number of discreets is equal to the number of inputs + outputs as defined in the Param/Type@options dimension.

ErrorMessage.Name: MissingDiscreetValue

Description.Format: Missing matrix Discreet values '{0}'. Param ID '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Make sure Discreet values are sequentially incremented by 1.

ErrorMessage.Name: DiscreetsNotOneBased

Description.Format: Matrix Discreet values should be one-based. Param ID '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Make sure the first discreet value is 1.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidAttribute

Description.Format: Invalid syntax for 'Measurement/Type@link' attribute on matrix Param. Matrix PID '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Make sure the value contains a valid file name including the .xml extension.

ErrorMessage.Name: MissingAttribute
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Add link="XXXXXXXX.xml"

Description.Format: Unrecommended use of more than 2 columns. Page '{0}'. Param IDs '{1}'.
Id attribute '{0}' has been changed to '{1}' for Other tag with Value tag '{2}'. Param ID '{3}'.

Other with Value tag '{0}' has been deleted. Param '{1}'.
Other with Value tag '{0}' has been added. Param '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: MissingAttribute
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Add the attribute with value 0.

ErrorMessage.Name: EmptyAttribute
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Add the attribute with value 0.

Description.Format: Reference to non-existing column with IDX '{0}' in attribute 'index'. Table ID '{1}'.
Unrecommended value '{0}' in attribute 'index'. Recommended values '{2}'. Table ID '{1}'.
Invalid combination of OID value '{0}' and SNMP/OID@id value '{1}' in Param '{2}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: UnsupportedParam

Description.Format: Unsupported Param '{0}' reference in attribute 'SNMP/OID@id' in Param '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Refer to a standalone read param.

ErrorMessage.Name: MissingTag
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Add LengthType tag to the document.

Description.Format: Exception with state 'enabled'. Param '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: MissingAttribute
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Add missing state attribute

ErrorMessage.Name: UnrecommendedSavedReadParam

Description.Format: Unrecommended use of 'save' attribute. Param ID '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Depending on the use-case, you should either remove the save option or include another parameter within your response.[NewLine]-Is your parameter corresponding to a user configuration on the DataMiner element side -> don't use it in your response.[NewLine]- Is your parameter corresponding to data or configuration retrieved from your data-source -> no need to save it.[NewLine][NewLine]There might be some use-cases where you need to use a dataminer element configuration parameter as a filter/validation on whether a data-source response should be accepted or not. In such cases, you will indeed want to save such configuration parameter but then, you should copy its value to a fixed (and non-saved) parameter and include it within your response so that the user configuration does not get overwritten by the data-source response.

ErrorMessage.Name: IncompatibleVolatileTable
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Remove the 'volatile' option from the <ArrayOptions> tag or remove the incompatible features from the table (such as alarmed columns, foreign keys, or DVE usage).

ErrorMessage.Name: IncompatibleVolatileWithOption_Sub
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Remove the 'volatile' option from the <ArrayOptions> tag or remove the incompatible features from the table (such as alarmed columns, foreign keys, or DVE usage).

ErrorMessage.Name: SuggestedVolatileOption
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Add the 'volatile' option to the table's <ArrayOptions>.

Description.Format: C# compilation errors. QAction ID '{0}'.
No C# QAction code analysis was performed due to unsupported C# version '{0}' in Visual Studio version '{1}'.
Entry point '{0}.{1}' not found in QAction. QAction ID {2}.
Entry point method '{0}.{1}' has unexpected access modifier '{2}'. QAction ID {3}.
Entry point class '{0}' has unexpected access modifier '{1}'. QAction ID {2}.
Entry point method '{0}.{1}' has a first argument with unexpected type '{2}'. QAction ID {3}.
NotifyProtocol(220/*NT_FILL_ARRAY_WITH_COLUMN*/, ...) method with one or more DateTime(s) given to it requires 'Param@historySet=true' on column with PID '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: UnrecommendedXmlSerializerConstructor
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Use one of the following constructors:[NewLine]- XmlSerializer.XmlSerializer(Type)[NewLine]- XmlSerializer.XmlSerializer(Type, String)

ErrorMessage.Name: UnconsolidatedPackageReference

Description.Format: Package '{0}' has multiple versions across different QActions.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Consolidate the package references so they have the same version across all projects.

ErrorMessage.Name: UnconsolidatedPackageReference_Sub

Description.Format: QAction '{0}' has package '{1}' with version '{2}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Consolidate the package references so they have the same version across all projects.

ErrorMessage.Name: MissingSecureCoding

Description.Format: Missing Skyline.DataMiner.Utils.SecureCoding.Analyzers NuGet package. QAction ID '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Include the Skyline.DataMiner.Utils.SecureCoding.Analyzers NuGet package in all projects within the solution.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidInterAppReplyLogic
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: To ensure correct handling of messages, always respond to incoming interapp messages by invoking the `.Reply()` method on the original message object received from an external source. [NewLine][NewLine]It is incorrect to use the `.Reply()` method on newly created message objects. [NewLine]Additionally, avoid performing `.SetParameter(9000001, data);` or invoking `.Send` to the `ReturnAddress`, as these actions are also incorrect.

Description.Format: Invalid file encoding '{0}' detected in file '{1}'. QAction ID '{2}'.
Finalizer '{0}' is unrecommended. QAction ID '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: MismatchDevPack

Description.Format: Package '{0}' version '{1}' has a higher version than the version specified in the MinimumRequiredVersion tag '{2}'. QAction ID '{3}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Either increase version in the MinimumRequiredVersion tag or downgrade the package so it matches with the minimum required version.

ErrorMessage.Name: DeprecatedDll

Description.Format: Deprecated DLL '{0}' referenced. QAction '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Replace the deprecated DLL by a NuGet and adapt the QAction accordingly.

ErrorMessage.Name: UnsupportedValue

Description.Format: Unsupported value '{0}' in encoding attribute. QAction ID '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Convert the QAction to C#.

Description.Format: Invalid suffix '{0}' in 'Group/Content/Param' element. Group ID '{1}'.
Suffix 'table' in 'Group/Content/Param' element is considered obsolete. Group ID '{0}'.
Suffix '{0}' in'Group/Content/Param' element requires the group to be called from a multi-threaded timer. Group ID '{1}'.
Incompatible 'Group/Content' child '{1}' with 'Group/Type' '{0}'. Group ID '{2}'.
Unsupported mixed group content '{0}'. Group ID '{1}'.
Group with 'multipleGet' true contains more than 20 content elements. Group ID '{0}'.
Group contains more than 10 content elements. Group ID '{0}'.
Excessive 'id' Attribute in tag 'On' with value '{0}'. Trigger ID '{1}'.
Attribute 'On@id' cannot have multiple values. Trigger ID '{0}'.
Invalid use of leading zeros on 'On@id' attribute. Trigger ID '{0}'. Current value '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: MultipleAfterStartup

Description.Format: Multiple after startup Triggers. Trigger IDs '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Multiple Trigger after Startup Triggers need to be checked and merged into one Trigger.

Description.Format: The On tag value '{0}' can't be used in combination with the Time tag value '{1}'. Trigger ID '{2}'.
Multiple triggers with same Time/On combination. Trigger IDs '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidAfterStartupTriggerCondition

Description.Format: After startup Trigger can't have a Condition. Trigger ID '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Move the condition to a later step.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidAfterStartupActionCondition

Description.Format: After startup Action can't have a Condition. Action ID '{0}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Move the condition to a later step.

Description.Format: After startup Trigger must have a Type tag with value 'action'. Trigger ID '{0}'
After startup Action must have an On tag with value 'group'. Action ID '{0}'.
After startup Action must have a Type tag with value 'execute next' or 'execute'. Action ID '{0}'.
After startup Group must have a Type tag with value 'poll', 'poll trigger' or 'poll action'. Group ID '{0}'.
Attribute 'On@nr' references a non-existing 'Pair' with 1-based position '{0}' in Group '{1}'. Action ID '{2}' triggered by Trigger '{3}'.
{5}'Type@nr' attribute in action of type '{0}' on '{1}' references Connection '{2}' with wrong type '{3}'. Action ID '{4}'.
Attribute 'On@id' in action of type '{0}' on '{1}' references Group '{2}' which is missing 'Content/Param' tag(s). Action ID '{3}'.
Attribute 'On@id' in action of type '{0}' on '{1}' references Group '{2}' which references Param '{3}' with unsupported 'Param/Type' '{4}'. Action ID '{5}'.
Attribute 'On@id' in action of type '{0}' on '{1}' references Group '{2}' which references Param '{3}' with unsupported 'SNMP/Enabled' '{4}'. Action ID '{5}'.

ErrorMessage.Name: MissingTag
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Choose a value between '1' and '2.073.600.000' (included). The max value corresponds to 24 days.

ErrorMessage.Name: EmptyTag
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Choose a value between '1' and '2.073.600.000' (included). The max value corresponds to 24 days.

ErrorMessage.Name: UntrimmedTag
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Choose a value between '1' and '2.073.600.000' (included). The max value corresponds to 24 days.

ErrorMessage.Name: InvalidTagValue
ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Choose a value between '1' and '2.073.600.000' (included). The max value corresponds to 24 days.

ErrorMessage.Name: TimerTimeCannotBeLargerThan24Days

Description.Format: Timer Tag value '{0}' is higher than the max allowed value of 24 days. Timer id '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Choose a value between '1' and '2.073.600.000' (included). The max value corresponds to 24 days.

ErrorMessage.Name: DuplicateTimer

Description.Format: Duplicate Timer with Time '{0}'. Timer IDs '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Combine the timers into one.

ErrorMessage.Name: TooFastTimer

Description.Format: Too fast Timer Time '{0}'. Timer ID '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Increase the timer time to at least 1s.

ErrorMessage.Name: TooSimilarTimers

Description.Format: Timer Time values too similar. Timer IDs '{0}'. Time values '{1}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Change the timer time so that the difference between the specified time and the time of the other timers is at least 1s.

ErrorMessage.Name: DuplicateHeaderKeys

Description.Format: Duplicate Header '{0}' in HTTP request. Session ID '{1}'. Connection ID '{2}'.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Merge the duplicate headers into one by providing a comma separated list of values.

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Trim the Header tag value.

ErrorMessage.Name: MissingCrcResponseAction

ErrorMessage.HowToFix: Use a header and matching trailer parameter in the response.
